title: Create a Render Blueprint
description:
Create a render.yaml file for a Flask application that:
1. Uses Docker runtime
2. Connects to a PostgreSQL database named 'myapp-db'
3. Generates a SECRET_KEY automatically
4. Has a health check at /api/health
5. Auto-deploys from the main branch
instructions: Complete the render.yaml blueprint with proper service and database configuration.

testCases.description: Database name matches in both sections

hints.text: Web services use type: web and runtime: docker for Dockerfile-based builds
The database name in fromDatabase must match the name in the databases section
Use generateValue: true for SECRET_KEY to auto-generate a secure value

commonMistakes.mistake: Mismatched database names between fromDatabase and databases section
commonMistakes.consequence: Render can't link the service to the database
commonMistakes.correction: Ensure the name in fromDatabase.name matches databases[].name exactly

commonMistakes.consequence: Render can't verify if your app is running correctly
commonMistakes.correction: Add healthCheckPath with your health check endpoint
